channel.title: Hardcore PK - NO Bullshit just simple and fine
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]Hardcore PK promo[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]15+ online![/size][/center]
[center]WEBCLIENT[url=http://hardcorepk.sytes.net/]http://hardcorepk.sytes.net/[/url]WEBCLIENT[/center]
[img]http://s4.postimg.org/ux2zfozsd/hardcorepkown3.jpg[/img] [center][size=13pt]Active PKing.[/size][/center]
[center][size=13pt]NO Bullshit Just simple and fine![/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]NO Skilling[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]NO Donator benefits[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]NO LAG[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]Growing player base![/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]Addictive and Easy![/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]JUST flawless PKing and Monsters[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]PK works 100%[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]Max stats 135[/size][/center] [center][size=13pt]Login and get ready to rumble!![/size][/center]
[center][size=13pt]This is home.[/size][/center] [img]http://s11.postimg.org/qaxq2voqr/hardcorepkowns4.jpg[/img] [img]http://s14.postimg.org/oepzso08h/hardcorepkowns.jpg[/img] [center][size=13pt]Best Monsters and drops in Wilderness.[/size][/center] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/uzak08a1l/hardcorepkown2.jpg[/img] [center][size=13pt]no protect prayers! Makes pking more interesting...[/size][/center]
[center]WEBCLIENT[url=http://hardcorepk.sytes.net/]http://hardcorepk.sytes.net/[/url]WEBCLIENT[/center]
Staff positions OPEN This server is running on DEDICATED SERVER.

tbh it looks alright from what i read and saw in the homepage, loooking good man but look seriousl if u want more players then make the server more coded, code extra few things everyday… daily updates is what really brings along players,… add a new shop a day or a fix a bug/glitch a day or make a new spot/zone, a new tele to new boss or something like that u know… then it will all be okay like that + the players will flow onto ur server man!

thanks, and yes im making updates everyday.

item.title: Hardcore PK - NO Bullshit just simple and fine
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

When doing a PKing server like this, there cannot be too much… choice or variation. There needs to be one, maybe two areas at max that players can PK at ( id suggest one multi and one nonmulti ). And everything that a player will need, needs to be at the starting or home area. Also, your home can’t be too small ( places like mage bank ), players will need space to still buy/sell items, inferring that this server is not completely spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: Hardcore PK - NO Bullshit just simple and fine

are u loveing idiot! melee prots and prots for noobs! its currently off btw

Im sorry for raging but WHY THE HELL WOULD ANYONE DISABLE THE PROTECTION PRAYERS IF YOU PVM ASWELL!
it makes it virtually impossible for boss’s as corp.
also this looks like a regular trisidiax v3 leech[/quote]

i dont know what you talking about.! come try before say anything…
